Summary: very shiney like chrome too bright and reflective to make out
trends: There have been no other sightings in Akron
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
divs: Sighting DetailsMe my wife and daughter were driving home from sons football game we were traveling north on rt. 222 near the Akron exit. My wife saw first and said what is that in sky its going way to fast for plane and is very bright,as i was looking it seemed to stop like it knew we were looking at it,then tookoff and was out of sight in seconds the sun was setting behind us and it went ahead and to the right of us,within a min or two there were two trails in the sky from the direction of the sun,my daughter was able to get a picture of one of the trails,
